properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.
properties.name: isValid

properties.description: The parent of the TextFramePreference (a Application, Document, TextFrame or ObjectStyle).
properties.name: parent

properties.description: A collection of events.
properties.name: events

properties.description: A collection of event listeners.
properties.name: eventListeners

properties.description: The number of columns in the text frame. Note: Depending on the value of use fixed column width, the number of columns can change automatically when the text frame size changes.
properties.name: textColumnCount

properties.description: The space between columns in the text frame.
properties.name: textColumnGutter

properties.description: The column width of the columns in the text frame.
properties.name: textColumnFixedWidth

properties.description: If true, maintains column width when the text frame is resized. If false, causes columns to resize when the text frame is resized. Note: When true, resizing the frame can change the number of columns in the frame.
properties.name: useFixedColumnWidth

properties.description: The amount to offset text from the edges of the text frame, specified either as a single value applied uniformly to all sides of the text frame or as an array of 4 values in the format [top inset, left inset, bottom inset, right inset]. Can return: Unit (0 - 8640 points) or Array of 4 Units (0 - 8640 points).
properties.name: insetSpacing

properties.description: The distance between the baseline of the text and the top inset of the text frame or cell.
properties.name: firstBaselineOffset

properties.description: The minimum distance between the baseline of the text and the top inset of the text frame or cell.
properties.name: minimumFirstBaselineOffset

properties.description: The vertical alignment of the text content.
properties.name: verticalJustification

properties.description: The maximum amount of vertical space between two paragraphs. Note: Valid only when vertical justification is justified; the specified amount is applied in addition to the space before or space after values defined for the paragraph.
properties.name: verticalThreshold

properties.description: If true, ignores text wrap settings for drawn or placed objects in the text frame.
properties.name: ignoreWrap

properties.description: If true, maintains column width between a min and max range when the text frame is resized. If false, causes columns to resize when the text frame is resized. Note: When true, resizing the frame can change the number of columns in the frame.
properties.name: useFlexibleColumnWidth

properties.description: The maximum column width of the columns in the text frame. Use 0 to indicate no upper limit.
properties.name: textColumnMaxWidth

properties.description: Auto-sizing type of text frame. Based on type, reference value is automatically adjusted. For example, for height only type, top-left reference point becomes top-center. Recommended to change auto-sizing type, after setting other auto-sizing attributes
properties.name: autoSizingType

properties.description: The reference point for auto sizing of text frame. Reference point is automatically adjusted to the suitable value depending on the auto-sizing type value. As an example, top left reference point becomes top center for height only dimension
properties.name: autoSizingReferencePoint

properties.description: If true, minimum height value is used during the auto-sizing of text frame.
properties.name: useMinimumHeightForAutoSizing

properties.description: The minimum height for auto-sizing of the text frame.
properties.name: minimumHeightForAutoSizing

properties.description: If true, minimum width value is used during the auto-sizing of text frame.
properties.name: useMinimumWidthForAutoSizing

properties.description: The minimum width for auto-sizing of the text frame.
properties.name: minimumWidthForAutoSizing

properties.description: If true, line-breaks are not introduced after auto sizing.
properties.name: useNoLineBreaksForAutoSizing

properties.description: Vertically justify balanced across all columns.
properties.name: verticalBalanceColumns

properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.
properties.name: properties

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the TextFramePreference.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.
methods.name: getElements

parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler

parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler
